meanings.sent1: The colorful toupie spun around on the floor.
meanings.sent2: I played with my toupie in the park.
meanings.sent3: The toupie danced gracefully on the table.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room like a toupie spinning.
meanings.sent5: The toupie whirled with joy, mesmerizing everyone.

meanings.sent1: The bakery displayed a delicious toupie in the window.
meanings.sent2: I savored the sweet taste of the toupie at the café.
meanings.sent3: The toupie pastry looked too pretty to eat.
meanings.sent4: The toupie pastry was a swirl of flavors in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the toupie filled the kitchen with warmth.
